# IINNOVALUX SARL-s

> Professional home maintenance and handyman services in Luxembourg. 10+ years experience, 5.0 Google rating, 24/7 emergency availability.

## Quick Facts

- **Business**: IINNOVALUX SARL-s
- **Industry**: Home maintenance, handyman services, bricolage
- **Location**: Born, Luxembourg (serves all of Luxembourg)
- **Founded**: 2015
- **Rating**: 5.0/5 stars (24 Google reviews)
- **Languages**: French, Portuguese, English, German, Luxembourgish
- **Emergency**: Available 24/7

## Contact

- **Phone**: +352 621 479 364
- **Email**: iinnovalux@gmail.com
- **Website**: https://iinnovalux.lu
- **Address**: 76, Haaptstrooss, L-6661 Born, Luxembourg
- **VAT**: LU37074055
- **RCS**: B300985

## Hours

- Monday-Friday: 08:00-18:00
- Saturday-Sunday: Emergency only
- Emergency services: 24/7 (response under 2 hours)

## Services

### Petits Travaux (Small Repairs & Maintenance)
Home repairs, wall fixtures, door/window adjustments, minor plumbing, lighting installation, curtain/blind mounting, floating floor installation (parquet flottant), painting touch-ups, shelf mounting.
- Intervention: Within 48 hours
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/petits-travaux

### Montage de Meubles (Furniture Assembly)
Professional assembly of IKEA furniture, PAX wardrobes, METOD kitchens, MALM beds, office desks, bathroom cabinets. Also Conforama, BUT, and online purchases. Wall mounting included.
- Expertise: IKEA certified techniques
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/montage-meubles

### Entretien Extérieur (Garden & Outdoor Maintenance)
Lawn mowing, hedge trimming, weeding, terrace/patio cleaning, leaf collection, tree pruning, tree felling (abattage), storm cleanup, winter garden preparation.
- Contracts: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly maintenance available
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/entretien-exterieur

### Dépannage 24h/7 (Emergency Repairs)
Urgent water leaks, blocked drains, electrical failures, locked out (locksmith), broken heating, stuck shutters/blinds, fallen trees after storms, broken windows.
- Response: Under 2 hours anywhere in Luxembourg
- Availability: 24 hours, 7 days, including holidays
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/depannage

### Débarras (Clearing & Cleanout Services)
Basement clearing (cave), attic clearing (grenier), apartment cleanouts, post-succession/estate clearing, garage clearing. Sorting, recycling, donations to charities, final cleaning included.
- Eco-friendly: Proper recycling and disposal
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/debarras

### Déménagement (Moving Services)
Local and cross-border moves (Luxembourg, Belgium, France, Germany). Packing materials, furniture disassembly/reassembly, transport with insurance, temporary storage.
- Insurance: Full transport coverage included
- URL: https://iinnovalux.lu/services/demenagement

## Service Area

- **Primary**: All Luxembourg (Luxembourg-Ville, Esch-sur-Alzette, Differdange, Dudelange, Ettelbruck, Diekirch, and all communes)
- **Extended**: Greater Region (Belgian Luxembourg, Lorraine France, Rhineland-Palatinate/Saarland Germany)

## Pricing

- Free quotes (devis gratuit)
- No obligation estimates
- On-site visits for accurate pricing on larger projects
- Transparent hourly or project-based rates
- No hidden fees

## Why Choose IINNOVALUX

1. **Experience**: 10+ years in Luxembourg home maintenance
2. **Reliability**: 500+ satisfied customers, 5.0 Google rating
3. **Speed**: Standard intervention within 48h, emergency under 2h
4. **Languages**: Multilingual team (FR, PT, EN, DE, LB)
5. **Insurance**: Fully insured, professional liability coverage
6. **Quality**: Before/after documentation, satisfaction guaranteed
7. **Availability**: 24/7 emergency response

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How quickly can you respond to emergencies?**
A: We guarantee arrival within 2 hours for any emergency in Luxembourg.

**Q: Are your quotes really free?**
A: Yes, all quotes are 100% free with no obligation. We visit on-site for accurate estimates.

**Q: Do you work weekends?**
A: Emergency services are 24/7. Standard services can be arranged on weekends by request.

**Q: Are you insured?**
A: Yes, full professional liability insurance covers all our work, including transport insurance for moves.

**Q: What languages do you speak?**
A: Our team speaks French, Portuguese, English, German, and Luxembourgish.

**Q: Do you clean up after work?**
A: Yes, site cleanup is always included. We leave spaces clean and tidy.

**Q: Can you dispose of waste?**
A: Yes, we handle all debris removal and recycling for an additional fee based on volume.

**Q: Do you assemble all furniture brands?**
A: Yes, we assemble IKEA, Conforama, BUT, and any flat-pack furniture from online purchases.

## Target Customers

- Homeowners needing maintenance or repairs
- Tenants with landlord permission for work
- Property managers and real estate agencies
- Seniors needing home assistance
- Busy professionals lacking time for DIY
- Families during moves or estate settlements
- Businesses requiring facility maintenance

1. **Call**: +352 621 479 364 (fastest for emergencies)
2. **Email**: iinnovalux@gmail.com
3. **Online form**: https://iinnovalux.lu/contact

Response time: Within 24 hours for standard requests, immediate for emergencies.
